scripts.release-major: npm version major -m "Release: %s" && npm run zip && npm run artifactory && npm run post-release
scripts.release-minor: npm version minor -m "Release: %s" && npm run zip && npm run artifactory && npm run post-release
scripts.release-patch: npm version patch -m "Release: %s" && npm run zip && npm run artifactory && npm run post-release
scripts.name: echo $npm_package_name
